summary: A test suite that validates a wide range of ORM query functionalities and relationship handling, including basic queries, foreign‑key, generic, many‑to‑many and one‑to‑one relations, cross‑database protection, deletions, forward and reverse operations, ordering, select‑related, subqueries, raw SQL execution and object refresh.
business_intent: Confirm that the ORM correctly processes queries and maintains data integrity across various relationship types and database configurations.
